backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature for replacing static site images with user-uploaded ones; contains metadata only.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short summaries for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining color variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all site sections within the layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders Discord link and community info with icons and styled cards.
Displays feature cards using icons and data from siteConfig.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing server info, quick links, and a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, logo, server name, and join button.
frontend/src/components/HowToJoinSection: Shows steps for joining the server and provides a copy-to-clipboard server address box.
frontend/src/components/RulesSection.tsx: Lists server rules with numbered cards and an important notice box.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper containing navigation, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive site navigation component with smooth section scrolling and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login/logout, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module exporting nothing because backend has no methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom light/dark OKLCH color variables inspired by Minecraft aesthetics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts: Static configuration for server metadata, rules, and feature descriptions used across the site.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current site purpose, features, issues, and required assets for Cooper SMP.
